API Journey Workshops



Areas Of The API Journey

Discovery

Knowing where all of your digital resources are, and what your enterprise capabilities are.

  • Outline - View the discovery area of the API lifecycle as an outline.
  • Outline w/ Detail - View the discovery area of the API lifecycle as an outline with details.
  • Presentation - View the discovery area of the API lifecycle as a presentation.

Design

Moving to a design first approach to defining enterprise API resources and capabilities.

  • Outline - View the design area of the API lifecycle as an outline.
  • Outline w/ Detail - View the design area of the API lifecycle as an outline with details.
  • Presentation - View the design area of the API lifecycle as a presentation.

Deployment

Considering what the unique API lifecycle needs are during the deployment phase.

  • Outline - View the deployment area of the API lifecycle as an outline.
  • Outline w/ Detail - View the deployment area of the API lifecycle as an outline with details.
  • Presentation - View the deployment area of the API lifecycle as a presentation.

Operations

Looking at how to manage APIs while they are in production, operating them reliably.

  • Outline - View the production area of the API lifecycle as an outline.
  • Outline w/ Detail - View the production area of the API lifecycle as an outline with details.
  • Presentation - View the production area of the API lifecycle as a presentation.

Outreach

Considering how to reach out to all stakeholders and making sure they are playing an active role.

  • Outline - View the outreach area of the API lifecycle as an outline.
  • Outline w/ Detail - View the outreach area of the API lifecycle as an outline with details.
  • Presentation - View the outreach area of the API lifecycle as a presentation.

Governance

Understanding how to track, measure, and quantify API operations and provide guidance.

  • Outline - View the governance area of the API lifecycle as an outline.
  • Outline w/ Detail - View the governance area of the API lifecycle as an outline with details.
  • Presentation - View the governance area of the API lifecycle as a presentation.
